meanings.definition: A sandwich made with bread and a filling such as meat or cheese.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious buttie for lunch today.
meanings.sent2: My mom makes the best buttie with ham and cheese.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally sat on my buttie, and now it's flat!
meanings.sent4: The buttie was a tower of flavors in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the freshly baked buttie filled the room.

meanings.sent1: My buttie and I always have fun together.
meanings.sent2: I can always count on my buttie for support.
meanings.sent3: My buttie tells the best jokes and makes me laugh.
meanings.sent4: She is the sunshine in my life, my buttie.
meanings.sent5: I cherish the moments spent with my dear buttie.
